description: RFQ/Notice of Proposed Project: Jerry Cans for Canadian Defense
full_summary:
### Government of Canada: Tenders and Bids
### Tender Details

#### Tender Title
– **English**: MSVS Jerry Can
– **French**: SVSM Bidon, Bouchon à Vis

#### Reference Number
PW-22-01013208

#### Solicitation Number
W8486-238945/A

#### Tender Status
The tender process has expired.

#### Procurement Details

The Department of National Defence requires the delivery of two items with the following specifications:

1. **Item 1**: Jerry Can 20L DEF
   – **GSIN**: 8110 (Drums and Cans)
   – **Part Number**: 9811569
   – **Quantity**: 1700 units per each unit of issue
   – **Unit of Issue**: Each (EAT)
   – **Delivery Location**: 25 CFSD Montreal Quebec
2. **Item 2**: Jerry Can 20L DEF
   – **GSIN**: 8110 (Drums and Cans)
   – **Part Number**: 9811569
   – **Quantity**: 800 units per each unit of issue
   – **Unit of Issue**: Each (EAT)
   – **Delivery Location**: 7 CFSD Edmonton Alberta

#### Urgent Requirements
The delivery of the above items is requested by March 31, 2023.

#### Electronic Submission of Bids
Bidders must submit their bids electronically via email to [DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca](mailto:DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca) as per solicitation document.

#### Accessing Tender Documents
The documents related to this RFP are available on the Canada Buys website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

#### quotation- Solicitation References
Refer to Amendment 002, available in the solicitation document: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/17/8087ae51887b75267f3cf21887d478d2/w8486-238945-msvs-sources- Bidon-BouchonVis-RFP_amendment_002.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/17/8087ae51887b75267f3cf
